item.title: Instantiate CRMServiceClient using current user's login
item.description: TheGet-CrmConnection method can be used to return connection to a CRM instance. The syntax to call the method is``` Parameter Set: OnLine Get-CrmConnection [-OnLineType] [[-Credential] ] [-DeploymentRegion] [[-ProfileName] ] -OrganizationName [ ] Parameter Set: OnPrem Get-CrmConnection [-ServerUrl] [[-Credential] ] [-OrganizationName] [[-HomeRealmUrl] ] [[-ProfileName] ] [ ] Parameter Set: UIOnly Get-CrmConnection [[-InteractiveMode]] [ ] I wanted to get the crm connection with the current user's credentials without any prompts. [The first and secondÂ options required the object PSCredential which can't be created using logged current user's credentials](http://stackoverflow.
